explanation: [0-0] It's a three-part screen. The upper part is black, and the subtitles "👿RESPECT👿" appear below. The middle part shows the inside of an airplane cabin. A blond boy and a long-haired lady wearing a gold necklace are in the middle. The boy is sitting on the outer side, turning his head towards the lady wearing a gold necklace on the inner side. The lady is leaning sideways, facing forward, her eyes looking at the blond boy. A little bit of the reddish-brown backrest is exposed on the left side. At the bottom is the English subtitle "CFS YT". The lower part of the screen is black.
